person.persName: Pleasant Hines (Warren County farmer and Police Judge of Bowling Green)

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky farmer and Police Judge of Bowling Green. Charlotte County, Virginia native. Married Hetta Jackson Hines in 1817. Married Tabitha A. Hines. Father of William H. Hines. Served in the Kentucky House of Representatives from 1857 to 1859. Held thirty-three slaves in 1860.
